summary.span: Represents a Windows label control that can display hyperlinks.

span.span: Represents a Windows label control that can display hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會取代並將功能加入至和控制項。The control replaces and adds functionality to the and controls. 不過，和控制項會保留回溯相容性和未來使用，如果您選擇。However, the and controls are retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 控制項是類似於與例外狀況，它可以顯示的超連結控制項。The control is similar to a control with the exception that it can display a hyperlink. 控制項的文字中，可以指定多個超連結。Multiple hyperlinks can be specified in the text of the control. 每個超連結可以執行的應用程式內不同的工作。Each hyperlink can perform a different task within an application. 比方說，您可以使用超連結，在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中顯示的網站，或載入應用程式相關聯的記錄檔中。For example, you can use a hyperlink to display a Web site in Microsoft Internet Explorer or to load a log file associated with an application. 顯示每個超連結控制項是的執行個體類別。Each hyperlink displayed in the control is an instance of the class. 類別會定義顯示資訊、 狀態和超連結的位置。The class defines display information, state, and location of the hyperlink. 颾魤 ㄛ屬性類別可讓您將相關聯的資訊，例如，若要顯示，與超連結的 URL。In addition, the property of the class enables you to associate information, such as a URL to display, with the hyperlink. 當使用者按一下超連結在控制項中的引發事件時，而物件表示已按下超連結的一部分傳遞做為參數傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。When a user clicks a hyperlink within the control, the event is raised, and the object representing the hyperlink that was clicked is passed as part of the object that is passed as a parameter to the event handler. 您可以使用此物件來取得由使用者所按的超連結相關聯的物件。You can use this object to obtain the object associated with the hyperlink that was clicked by the user. 內含的所有超連結控制會儲存在控制項的類別執行個體。All hyperlinks contained within the control are stored in the class instance for the control. 若要新增的超連結的兩種方式控制項。There are two ways to add a hyperlink to the control. 最快方式就是指定並將它指派給屬性。The quickest way is to specify a and assign it to the property. 這可讓您指定的控制項文字內的單一超連結。This enables you to specify a single hyperlink within the text of the control. 若要新增多個超連結，您可以使用方法類別，藉由存取透過集合屬性。To add multiple hyperlinks, you can use the method of the class by accessing the collection through the property. 當建立控制項時，預設的超連結，其中包含內的所有文字控制項加入至。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結屬性，或指定連結，使用方法。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 您也可以藉由移除預設的超連結方法的類別。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. 屬性是`true`根據預設，只要至少一個連結的長度大於零的集合。The property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the collection. 控制項都有單一值。The control has a single value. 不過，每個連結的長度大於零會取得自己定位停駐點，由左到右的順序。However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order. 若要防止 索引標籤瀏覽至控制項，並設定屬性設`false`。To prevent tab navigation to the control, set the property to `false`. 不過，請注意，將新連結加入集合將會自動設定屬性設`true`一次。However, be aware that adding new links to the collection will automatically set the property to `true` again. 提供數個屬性，可讓您定義在控制項中的超連結的顯示外觀。The provides a number of properties that enable you to define the display appearance of hyperlinks in the control. ， ， ，和屬性會定義用來顯示處於不同狀態的超連結的色彩。The , , , and properties define the colors used when displaying a hyperlink in various states. 屬性定義超連結相關聯的底線顯示。The property defines the display of the underline that is associated with a hyperlink. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別。The following example demonstrates using the class. 範例會處理開啟網站上的事件。The example handles the event by opening a Web site. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/CS/form.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/VB/form.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. value.span: A ，表示顯示作用中連結的色彩。

value.span: 預設色彩由系統指定，這個色彩通常是。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作用中連結會是正在被按下的連結。An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked. 這是類似於使用的狀態的控制項。This is similar to the depressed state of a control. 您可以使用這個屬性來指定程序被按下連結時，將會顯示在的連結的色彩。You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked. 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 指定在顯示的所有連結的色彩控制項。The specifies the color of all links displayed in the control. 屬性可讓您指定之連結的色彩之後使用者已瀏覽。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. 停用連結時，用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或無法正確顯示文字。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確連結正在被按下。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性使用列舉型別。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它也會示範設定，和屬性。It also demonstrates setting the , and properties. 若要執行此範例中將它貼在空白表單並呼叫`InitializeLinkLabel`從表單的建構函式或`Load`方法。To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您指定的色彩中已停用的連結。This property enables you to specify the color for links that are disabled in the . 已停用的連結並不會造成會引發事件。Disabled links do not cause the event to be raised. 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 連結中的所有最初會顯示使用中定義的色彩屬性。All links in the are initially displayed with the color defined in the property. 屬性可讓您在過程中被按下時，指定連結的色彩。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 屬性可讓您指定之連結的色彩之後使用者已瀏覽。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或無法正確顯示文字。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確的連結已停用。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is disabled. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供快速的方式，來指定單一的超連結，可顯示的文字中控制項。The property provides a quick way to specify a single hyperlink to display in the text of the control. 物件提供屬性，以指定控制項的文字和超連結文字的長度內連結的開始位置。The object provides properties that specify the starting position of the link within the text of the control and the length of text for the hyperlink. 使用指定超連結時屬性，超連結加入至的控制項。When a hyperlink is specified using the property, the hyperlink is added to the of the control. 屬性轉換物件指派給要會儲存在集合內的物件。The property converts the object assigned to it to a object that is stored within the collection. 若要將多個超連結加入至控制項的文字中，您可以使用屬性。To add multiple hyperlinks to the text of the control, you can use the property. 屬性可讓您存取的屬性和方法，它會儲存為控制項指定的連結。The property enables you to access the properties and methods of the , which stores the links specified for the control. 這個方法的加入連結也可讓您指定在資料所建立的連結有關聯的屬性。This method of adding links to the also enables you to specify data in the property that is associated with the link being created. 值屬性可以用來儲存要顯示之檔案的位置或網站的位址。The value of the property can be used to store the location of a file to display or the address of a Web site. 當建立控制項時，預設的超連結，其中包含內的所有文字控制項加入至。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結屬性，或指定連結，使用方法。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 您也可以藉由移除預設的超連結方法的類別。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. > [!NOTE] > 屬性一律會傳回第一個項目，而不論超連結新增至集合的方式。The property always returns the first item in the , regardless of how the hyperlink was added to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 上的屬性如果您呼叫將會不同，和屬性包含雙位元組字元。The property on will differ if you call , and the property contains double-byte characters. 如果您呼叫，它會傳回字串中的位元組數目。If you call , it will return the number of bytes in the string. 否則，它會傳回實際的字元數。Otherwise, it will return the number of actual characters. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，處理事件，以執行工作，當使用者按一下控制項中的連結。Typically, the event is handled to perform tasks when the user clicks on a link in the control. 事件處理常式事件傳遞的執行個體類別，其中包含所按的連結相關聯的物件。The event handler for the event is passed an instance of the class that contains a object that is associated with the link that was clicked. 您可以使用資訊中指定屬性類別以決定何種連結已按下或按下哪種類型的工作執行時的連結。You can use information specified in the property of class to determine which link was clicked or what type of task to perform when the link is clicked. 比方說，如果控制項有物件以定義其屬性設定為 字串 www.microsoft.com，您可以使用這項資訊的事件處理常式中事件，以顯示網站。For example, if a control has a object defined with its property set to the string www.microsoft.com, you can use this information in an event handler for the event to display the Web site. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別。The following example demonstrates using the class. 範例會處理開啟網站上的事件。The example handles the event by opening a Web site. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/CS/form.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/VB/form.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您指定一開始會顯示中的所有連結的色彩。This property enables you to specify the color that is initially displayed for all links in the . 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 屬性可讓您在過程中被按下時，指定連結的色彩。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 屬性可讓您指定之連結的色彩之後使用者已瀏覽。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. 停用連結時，用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或無法正確顯示文字。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 比方說，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，連結的文字不會正確顯示。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text of the link is not shown properly. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可以顯示任意數目的控制項文字中的連結。A control can display any number of links within the text of the control. 這個屬性可讓您存取相關聯的執行個體，表示控制項中顯示的連結集合。This property enables you to access the instance associated with the that represents the collection of links displayed in the control. 然後，您可以使用的成員類別來新增、 移除和尋找集合中的連結。You can then use the members of the class to add, remove, and find links in the collection. 如需詳細資訊的工作類型的連結集合，您可以執行，請參閱。For more information on the types of tasks you can perform with the link collection, see . 當建立控制項時，預設的超連結，其中包含內的所有文字控制項加入至。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結屬性，或指定連結，使用方法。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 您也可以藉由移除預設的超連結方法的類別。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. 如果您不需要指定一個以上的連結可以顯示內，您可以使用屬性。If you do not need to specify more than one link to display within the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項並不會自動代表的已瀏覽的連結的連結。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要將連結顯示為已瀏覽的連結，您可以設定此屬性的值`true`中的事件處理常式事件的。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the event of a . 已瀏覽的連結會顯示使用中指定的色彩屬性控制項。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. 一次表單，其中包含控制項已關閉、 已刪除連結相關聯的 「 所有顯示 」 狀態。Once the form containing the control is closed, the "all display" state associated with the link is deleted. 若要保留連結的顯示狀態，您要將連結的顯示狀態儲存在您的應用程式相關聯的登錄設定。In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會影響中定義的第一個連結控制項。This property only affects the first link defined in the control. 如果您有多個控制項中所指定的連結時，使用屬性類別。If you have more than one link specified in the control, use the property of the class. 您可以在定義的所有連結使用屬性。You can access all the links defined in the by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性使用列舉型別。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它也會示範設定，和屬性。It also demonstrates setting the , and properties. 若要執行此範例中將它貼在空白表單並呼叫`InitializeLinkLabel`從表單的建構函式或`Load`方法。To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息處理對話方塊字元，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 逸出和方向鍵的前置處理期間，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message pre-processing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 只有當呼叫這個方法`isInputKey`方法會指示控制項不想要在索引鍵。This method is called only if the `isInputKey` method indicates that the control isn't interested in the key. `processDialogKey` 只傳送至父代的字元`processDialogKey`方法或如果控制項沒有父代，會傳回 false。`processDialogKey` simply sends the character to the parent's `processDialogKey` method, or returns false if the control has no parent. `Form`類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The `Form` class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys. 在覆寫`processDialogKey`，控制項應該傳回`true`指出它已處理的索引鍵。When overriding `processDialogKey`, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the key. 針對未處理的控制項，也就是結果的索引鍵`base.processDialogChar`應該傳回。For keys that aren't processed by the control, the result of `base.processDialogChar` should be returned. 控制項將很少，鮮，需要覆寫這個方法。Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是`true`根據預設，只要至少一個連結的長度大於零的集合。The property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the collection. 控制項都有單一值。The control has a single value. 不過，每個連結的長度大於零會取得自己定位停駐點，由左到右的順序。However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order. 若要防止 索引標籤瀏覽至控制項，並設定屬性設`false`。To prevent tab navigation to the control, set the property to `false`. 不過，請注意，將新連結加入集合將會自動設定屬性設`true`一次。However, be aware that adding new links to the collection will automatically set the property to `true` again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`LinkLabel1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `LinkLabel1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版中的相容性的文字呈現。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`false`，則涵蓋整個文字。If the property is set to `false`, the covers the entire text. 比方說，例如"abcd"的文字會轉譯與句尾空格加上底線。For example, text such as "abcd " is rendered with the trailing space underlined. 如果屬性設定為`true`，則並未涵蓋整個文字。If the property is set to `true`, the does not cover the entire text. `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性要提供視覺化的相容性，Windows Form 控制項之間呈現文字使用類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂的文字轉譯使用類別。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式不從正在升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或是[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎類別中導入[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了改善效能，讓文字看起來好，並改善的國際字型支援。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在舊版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，則[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎類別用來執行所有的文字呈現。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距] 和 [自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用類別來呈現文字，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解決此不相容情況，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性設`true`特定控制項。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`要`true`針對應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫方法的參數`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您指定的顯示中的所有連結的色彩`LinkLabel` ，已由使用者瀏覽。This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the `LinkLabel` that have been visited by the user. 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 連結中的所有最初會顯示使用中定義的色彩屬性。All links in the are initially displayed with the color defined in the property. 屬性可讓您在過程中被按下時，指定連結的色彩。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 停用連結時，用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或無法正確顯示文字。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 比方說，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正常時連結會顯示為已瀏覽的連結。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links.
